Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Gigatron/The Skyscorchers/Vulois:::

::Vulois smiles::
Vulois: Good. We shall depart as soon as possible. Have you a ship?
Windrazor: I bet the ship me and the other Skyscorchers came on is 
salvageable.
Vulois: Great. Let's get it.
::Awhile later, the ship is complete and has been flown to their location::
Windrazor: Afterburner, is everything working?
Afterburner: She's running as good as new.
Terradive: Awesome! Let's get out of here!
Vulois: I have an idea, let's not go back to Cybertron.
Terradive: Why?
Gigatron: I know.  Because we will be surrounded by bots that could start a 
war at any minute.
Vulois: Exactly.
Windrazor: but where will we go?
Vulois: A little planet called Draziw. 4th planet of the Andromeda galaxy.  
There are no Transformers there except for a kind king and queen.
Afterburner: Sounds good, lets go.
::They board the ship, but keep the door open so Thundercracker can get in::

--part1_ea.1509617d.2829f4e4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
